00007 #pragma once
00008 
00009 #include <set>
00010 #include <utility>
00011 #include <cstddef>
00012 #include <iterator>
00013 
00014 namespace lsf {
00015 namespace container {
00016 namespace detail {
00017 
00019 // RBTreeNode
00021 template <typename ElemType, typename SizeType>
00022 struct RBTreeNode {
00023     SizeType lchild_pos;
00024     SizeType rchild_pos;
00025     SizeType parent_pos;
00026     ElemType data;
00027     uint8_t color;
00028 };
00029 
00031 // RBTreeState
00033 template <typename ElemType, typename SizeType>
00034 class RBTreeState {
00035 public:
00036     using value_type = ElemType;
00037     using size_type = SizeType;
00038     using node_type = RBTreeNode<ElemType, SizeType>;
00039     using this_type = RBTreeState<ElemType, SizeType>;
00040 
00041     static const size_type NPOS = 0;
00042 
00043     static const uint8_t BLACK = 0x0;
00044     static const uint8_t RED = 0x1;
00045     static const uint8_t EMPTY = 0x2;
00046 
00047 public:
00048     void Init(size_type byte_size) {
00049         _root_pos = NPOS;
00050         _empty_head_pos = 1;
00051         _max_size = (byte_size - sizeof(this_type)) / sizeof(node_type);
00052         _size = 0;
00053         _elem_byte_size = sizeof(value_type);
00054 
00055         // make empty list a loop
00056         // use lchild and rchild as prev_pos and next_pos
00057         for (size_type pos = 1; pos < _max_size; pos++) {
00058             SetLChildPos(pos, pos - 1);
00059             SetRChildPos(pos, pos + 1);
00060             SetColor(pos, EMPTY);
00061         }
00062         SetLChildPos(1, _max_size - 1);
00063         SetRChildPos(_max_size - 1, 1);
00064 
00065         // NIL node must be black
00066         SetColor(NPOS, BLACK);
00067         SetParentPos(NPOS, NPOS);
00068         SetLChildPos(NPOS, NPOS);
00069         SetRChildPos(NPOS, NPOS);
00070     }
00071 
00073     // for debug
00075     // red black tree feature
00076     // 1. all node is red or black
00077     // 2. root node is black
00078     // 3. all NPOS node is black
00079     // 4. red node can only have black child
00080     // 5. any path to a leaf contains same number of black node
00081     bool CheckConsist() const {
00082         if (GetColor(_empty_head_pos) != EMPTY && _empty_head_pos != NPOS) {
00083             return false;
00084         }
00085         if (GetColor(_root_pos) != BLACK) {
00086             return false;
00087         }
00088 
00089         if (GetColor(NPOS) != BLACK) {
00090             return false;
00091         }
00092 
00093         // check empty list
00094         std::set<size_t> empty_sets;
00095         if (_empty_head_pos != NPOS) empty_sets.insert(_empty_head_pos);
00096         for (size_t pos = GetRChildPos(_empty_head_pos); pos != _empty_head_pos && _empty_head_pos != NPOS;
00097              pos = GetRChildPos(pos)) {
00098             if (GetColor(pos) != EMPTY) {
00099                 return false;
00100             }
00101             if (!(empty_sets.insert(pos).second)) {
00102                 return false;
00103             }
00104         }
00105         if (empty_sets.size() != max_size() - size()) {
00106             return false;
00107         }
00108 
00109         // check use list
00110         std::set<size_t> use_sets;
00111         for (size_t pos = FindSmallestPos(); pos != NPOS; pos = FindNextBigPos(pos)) {
00112             if (GetColor(pos) != RED && GetColor(pos) != BLACK) {
00113                 return false;
00114             }
00115             if (!(use_sets.insert(pos).second)) {
00116                 return false;
00117             }
00118         }
00119         if (use_sets.size() != size()) {
00120             std::cout << use_sets.size() << "," << size() << std::endl;
00121             return false;
00122         }
00123 
00124         return true;
00125     }
00126 
00128     // FindNode
00130     std::pair<size_type, size_type> FindNode(value_type const& val) {
00131         size_type pos = _root_pos;
00132         size_type parent_pos = NPOS;
00133 
00134         while (pos != NPOS) {
00135             // already exist
00136             if (*GetDataPtr(pos) == val) break;
00137 
00138             if (*GetDataPtr(pos) < val) {
00139                 parent_pos = pos;
00140                 pos = GetRChildPos(pos);
00141             } else {
00142                 parent_pos = pos;
00143                 pos = GetLChildPos(pos);
00144             }
00145         }
00146         return std::make_pair(pos, parent_pos);
00147     }
00148 
00149     size_type FindSmallestPos() const { return FindSmallestPos(_root_pos); }
00150 
00151     size_type FindSmallestPos(size_type from_pos) const {
00152         if (from_pos == NPOS) return NPOS;
00153 
00154         size_type pos;
00155         for (pos = from_pos; GetLChildPos(pos) != NPOS; pos = GetLChildPos(pos))
00156             ;
00157         return pos;
00158     }
00159 
00160     size_type FindBiggestPos() const { return FindBiggestPos(_root_pos); }
00161 
00162     size_type FindBiggestPos(size_type from_pos) const {
00163         if (from_pos == NPOS) return NPOS;
00164 
00165         size_type pos;
00166         for (pos = from_pos; GetRChildPos(pos) != NPOS; pos = GetRChildPos(pos))
00167             ;
00168         return pos;
00169     }
00170 
00171     size_type FindNextBigPos(size_type pos) const {
00172         if (pos == NPOS) {
00173             return FindSmallestPos();
00174         }
00175 
00176         if (GetRChildPos(pos) != NPOS) {
00177             return FindSmallestPos(GetRChildPos(pos));
00178         }
00179 
00180         while (GetParentPos(pos) != NPOS) {
00181             if (GetLChildPos(GetParentPos(pos)) == pos) {
00182                 return GetParentPos(pos);
00183             }
00184             pos = GetParentPos(pos);
00185         }
00186 
00187         return NPOS;
00188     }
00189 
00190     size_type FindNextSmallPos(size_type pos) const {
00191         if (pos == NPOS) {
00192             return FindBiggestPos();
00193         }
00194 
00195         if (GetLChildPos(pos) != NPOS) {
00196             return FindBiggestPos(GetLChildPos(pos));
00197         }
00198 
00199         while (GetParentPos(pos) != NPOS) {
00200             if (GetRChildPos(GetParentPos(pos)) == pos) {
00201                 return GetParentPos(pos);
00202             }
00203             pos = GetParentPos(pos);
00204         }
00205 
00206         return NPOS;
00207     }
00208 
00210     // Rotate
00212     //        parent             parent             |
00213     //          |                  |                |
00214     //         pos               lpos               |
00215     //        /   \             /    \              |
00216     //     lpos   rpos  ==>  llpos   pos            |
00217     //     /  \                     /   \           |
00218     // llpos  lrpos             lrpos    rpos       |
00219     void RotateRight(size_type pos) {
00220         size_type parent = GetParentPos(pos);
00221         size_type lpos = GetLChildPos(pos);
00222         size_type lrpos = GetRChildPos(lpos);
00223 
00224         // handle parent
00225         if (parent == NPOS) {
00226             _root_pos = lpos;
00227         } else if (pos == GetLChildPos(parent)) {
00228             SetLChildPos(parent, lpos);
00229         } else {
00230             SetRChildPos(parent, lpos);
00231         }
00232 
00233         // handle lpos
00234         SetParentPos(lpos, parent);
00235         SetRChildPos(lpos, pos);
00236 
00237         // handle pos
00238         SetParentPos(pos, lpos);
00239         SetLChildPos(pos, lrpos);
00240 
00241         // handle lrpos
00242         if (lrpos != NPOS) SetParentPos(lrpos, pos);
00243     }
00244 
00245     //        parent                parent          |
00246     //          |                      |            |
00247     //         pos                   rpos           |
00248     //        /   \                 /    \          |
00249     //     lpos   rpos    ==>     pos    rrpos      |
00250     //           /    \          /   \              |
00251     //       rlpos    rrpos   lpos   rlpos          |
00252     void RotateLeft(size_type pos) {
00253         size_type parent = GetParentPos(pos);
00254         size_type rpos = GetRChildPos(pos);
00255         size_type rlpos = GetLChildPos(rpos);
00256 
00257         // handle parent
00258         if (parent == NPOS) {
00259             _root_pos = rpos;
00260         } else if (pos == GetLChildPos(parent)) {
00261             SetLChildPos(parent, rpos);
00262         } else {
00263             SetRChildPos(parent, rpos);
00264         }
00265 
00266         // handle rpos
00267         SetParentPos(rpos, parent);
00268         SetLChildPos(rpos, pos);
00269 
00270         // handle pos
00271         SetParentPos(pos, rpos);
00272         SetRChildPos(pos, rlpos);
00273 
00274         // handle rlpos
00275         if (rlpos != NPOS) SetParentPos(rlpos, pos);
00276     }
00277 
00279     // GetNewNodeAndInsert
00281     size_type GetNewNodeAndInsert(value_type const& val) {
00282         std::pair<size_type, size_type> res_pair = FindNode(val);
00283 
00284         size_type pos = res_pair.first;
00285         size_type parent_pos = res_pair.second;
00286 
00287         // if already exist
00288         if (pos != NPOS) return NPOS;
00289 
00290         // get one node from empty list
00291         _size++;
00292         size_type new_pos = GetNodeFromEmptyList();
00293 
00294         // initiate node
00295         SetLChildPos(new_pos, NPOS);
00296         SetRChildPos(new_pos, NPOS);
00297         SetParentPos(new_pos, parent_pos);
00298         SetColor(new_pos, RED);
00299 
00300         // this is the first node
00301         if (parent_pos == NPOS) {
00302             _root_pos = new_pos;
00303         } else if (*GetDataPtr(parent_pos) < val) {
00304             SetRChildPos(parent_pos, new_pos);
00305         } else {
00306             SetLChildPos(parent_pos, new_pos);
00307         }
00308 
00309         // do fixup, maintain rb tree requirements
00310         InsertFixup(new_pos);
00311         return new_pos;
00312     }
00313 
00314     void InsertFixup(size_type new_pos) {
00315         size_type parent_pos = GetParentPos(new_pos);
00316 
00317         // [1] if node is root, then change it to black
00318         if (parent_pos == NPOS) {
00319             SetColor(new_pos, BLACK);
00320             return;
00321         }
00322 
00323         // [2] if parent node is black, all features preserved, so return
00324         if (GetColor(parent_pos) == BLACK) {
00325             return;
00326         }
00327 
00328         size_type grand_parent_pos = GetParentPos(parent_pos);
00329         size_type uncle_pos = GetBrotherPos(parent_pos);
00330 
00331         // [3] if uncle and parent are both red,
00332         // we change uncle and parent to black, then change grand_parent to red
00333         // and do it recursively to grand_parent
00334         //     grandparent[B]             grandparent[R]        |
00335         //       /       \                 /         \          |
00336         //   parent[R]  uncle[R]  ==>  parent[B]    uncle[B]    |
00337         //     /                         /                      |
00338         //   new[R]                   new[R]                    |
00339         if (GetColor(uncle_pos) == RED) {
00340             SetColor(uncle_pos, BLACK);
00341             SetColor(parent_pos, BLACK);
00342             SetColor(grand_parent_pos, RED);
00343             InsertFixup(grand_parent_pos);
00344             return;
00345         }
00346 
00347         // [4.1] if new node is rchild of parent, and parent is lchild of grandparent, then we rotate left parent
00348         //     grandparent[B]           grandparent[B]  |
00349         //       /        \                /      \     |
00350         //    parent[R]  uncle[B]  ==>  new[R]  uncle[B]|
00351         //         \                    /               |
00352         //          new[R]            parent[R]         |
00353         if (GetRChildPos(parent_pos) == new_pos && GetLChildPos(grand_parent_pos) == parent_pos) {
00354             RotateLeft(parent_pos);
00355             InsertFixup(parent_pos);
00356             return;
00357         }
00358 
00359         // [4.2] if new node is lchild of parent, and parent is rchild of grandparent, then we rotate right parent
00360         //     grandparent[B]          grandparent[B]   |
00361         //      /      \               /        \       |
00362         //  uncle[B]  parent[R]  ==> uncle[B]  new[R]   |
00363         //            /                          \      |
00364         //          new[R]                   parent[R]  |
00365         if (GetRChildPos(parent_pos) == new_pos && GetLChildPos(grand_parent_pos) == parent_pos) {
00366             RotateRight(parent_pos);
00367             InsertFixup(parent_pos);
00368             return;
00369         }
00370 
00371         // [5] make parent black and grandparent red, then rotate grandparent
00372         //         grandparent[B]                  parent[B]                |
00373         //          /      \                       /      \                 |
00374         //     parent[R]   uncle[B]  ==>       new[R]   grandparent[R]      |
00375         //        /                                         \               |
00376         //   new[R]                                         uncle[B]        |
00377         SetColor(parent_pos, BLACK);
00378         SetColor(grand_parent_pos, RED);
00379 
00380         if (parent_pos == GetLChildPos(grand_parent_pos)) {
00381             RotateRight(grand_parent_pos);
00382         } else {
00383             RotateLeft(grand_parent_pos);
00384         }
00385     }
00386 
00388     // EraseNode
00390     void EraseNode(std::pair<size_type, size_type> pos_pair) {
00391         _size--;
00392         size_type pos = pos_pair.first;
00393         size_type parent_pos = pos_pair.second;
00394 
00395         size_type lchild_pos = GetLChildPos(pos);
00396         size_type rchild_pos = GetRChildPos(pos);
00397         // [1] if pos has two child, we must make sure it has at most 1 child
00398         //            pos               pos             |
00399         //           /   \              /  \            |
00400         //      lchild  rchild    lbiggest rchild       |
00401         //         \                  /                 |
00402         //         ...        ==>    ...                |
00403         //          \                   \               |
00404         //       lbiggest             lbiggest_lchild   |
00405         //             /                                |
00406         //      lbiggest_lchild                         |
00407         if (lchild_pos != NPOS && rchild_pos != NPOS) {
00408             // find the bigges node in left tree
00409             size_type lbiggest_pos = FindBiggestPos(lchild_pos);
00410 
00411             // replace node's data with left_biggest node's data
00412             *GetDataPtr(pos) = *GetDataPtr(lbiggest_pos);
00413 
00414             // then we erase left_biggest node, instead of erase pos
00415             // becuase left_biggest can't have rchild, this fits our request
00416             pos = lbiggest_pos;
00417             parent_pos = GetParentPos(pos);
00418             lchild_pos = GetLChildPos(pos);
00419             rchild_pos = GetRChildPos(pos);
00420         }
00421 
00422         // [2.1] if pos is red, we just erase pos, everything is fine
00423         //          parent[B]          parent[B]       |
00424         //             |                  |            |
00425         //           pos[R]    ==>    lchild[B]        |
00426         //           /                                 |
00427         //    lchild[B]                                |
00428         if (GetColor(pos) == RED && lchild_pos != NPOS) {
00429             DeleteAndFreeNode(pos, lchild_pos);
00430             return;
00431         }
00432         if (GetColor(pos) == RED && rchild_pos != NPOS) {
00433             DeleteAndFreeNode(pos, rchild_pos);
00434             return;
00435         }
00436         if (GetColor(pos) == RED && lchild_pos == NPOS && rchild_pos == NPOS) {
00437             DeleteAndFreeNode(pos, NPOS);
00438             return;
00439         }
00440 
00441         // [2.2] if pos has one child, pos is black and child is red, we just erase pos, change child to black
00442         //          parent[]          parent[]         |
00443         //             |                  |            |
00444         //           pos[B]    ==>    lchild[B]        |
00445         //           /                                 |
00446         //    lchild[R]                                |
00447         if (GetColor(pos) == BLACK && GetColor(lchild_pos) == RED) {
00448             SetColor(lchild_pos, BLACK);
00449             DeleteAndFreeNode(pos, lchild_pos);
00450             return;
00451         }
00452         if (GetColor(pos) == BLACK && GetColor(rchild_pos) == RED) {
00453             SetColor(rchild_pos, BLACK);
00454             DeleteAndFreeNode(pos, rchild_pos);
00455             return;
00456         }
00457 
00458         // [2.3] if pos has one child, pos and child are both black, we just erase pos and do fixup
00459         //          parent[]          parent[]         |
00460         //             |                  |            |
00461         //           pos[B]    ==>    lchild[B]        |
00462         //           /                                 |
00463         //    lchild[B]                                |
00464         if (GetColor(pos) == BLACK && lchild_pos != NPOS) {
00465             DeleteAndFreeNode(pos, lchild_pos);
00466             EraseFixup(parent_pos, lchild_pos);
00467             return;
00468         }
00469         if (GetColor(pos) == BLACK && rchild_pos != NPOS) {
00470             DeleteAndFreeNode(pos, rchild_pos);
00471             EraseFixup(parent_pos, rchild_pos);
00472             return;
00473         }
00474         if (GetColor(pos) == BLACK && lchild_pos == NPOS && rchild_pos == NPOS) {
00475             DeleteAndFreeNode(pos, NPOS);
00476             EraseFixup(parent_pos, NPOS);
00477             return;
00478         }
00479     }
00480 
00481     void DeleteAndFreeNode(size_type pos, size_type replace_pos) {
00482         if (pos == NPOS) return;
00483         size_type parent_pos = GetParentPos(pos);
00484 
00485         // do delete
00486         if (parent_pos == NPOS) {
00487             _root_pos = replace_pos;
00488         } else if (GetLChildPos(parent_pos) == pos) {
00489             SetLChildPos(parent_pos, replace_pos);
00490         } else {
00491             SetRChildPos(parent_pos, replace_pos);
00492         }
00493 
00494         if (replace_pos != NPOS) {
00495             SetParentPos(replace_pos, parent_pos);
00496         }
00497 
00498         // free pos
00499         InsertNodeToEmptyList(pos);
00500     }
00501 
00502     void EraseFixup(size_type parent_pos, size_type pos) {
00503         // if parent is NPOS, so the pos is root, and there will be no problem
00504         if (parent_pos == NPOS) return;
00505 
00506         // note that if we comes to EraseFixup, pos must be black
00507         size_type brother_pos = GetBrotherPos(parent_pos, pos);
00508         size_type blchild_pos = GetLChildPos(brother_pos);
00509         size_type brchild_pos = GetRChildPos(brother_pos);
00510 
00511         // [1] if brother is NPOS, just delete
00512         // [1] if brother is red, here change status to 3-5
00513         //       parent[B]                             brother[B]           |
00514         //       /    \                                 /       \           |
00515         //    pos[B]   brother[R]        ==>       parent[R]   brchild[B]   |
00516         //            /        \                    /     \                 |
00517         //        blchild[B]  brchild[B]        pos[B]   blchild[B]         |
00518         if (GetColor(brother_pos) == RED && GetLChildPos(parent_pos) == pos) {
00519             SetColor(parent_pos, RED);
00520             SetColor(brother_pos, BLACK);
00521             RotateLeft(parent_pos);
00522             // re-calc brother pos
00523             brother_pos = GetBrotherPos(parent_pos, pos);
00524             blchild_pos = GetLChildPos(brother_pos);
00525             brchild_pos = GetRChildPos(brother_pos);
00526         }
00527 
00528         if (GetColor(brother_pos) == RED && GetRChildPos(parent_pos) == pos) {
00529             SetColor(parent_pos, RED);
00530             SetColor(brother_pos, BLACK);
00531             RotateRight(parent_pos);
00532             // re-calc brother pos
00533             brother_pos = GetBrotherPos(parent_pos, pos);
00534             blchild_pos = GetLChildPos(brother_pos);
00535             brchild_pos = GetRChildPos(brother_pos);
00536         }
00537 
00538         // [2] if parent, brother, blchild, brchild are black
00539         //       parent[B]                             parent[B]                |
00540         //       /    \                                 /       \               |
00541         //    pos[B]   brother[B]        ==>       pos[B]   brother[R]          |
00542         //            /        \                             /     \            |
00543         //       blchild[B]   brchild[B]             blchild[B]   blchild[B]    |
00544         if (GetColor(parent_pos) == BLACK && GetColor(brother_pos) == BLACK && GetColor(blchild_pos) == BLACK &&
00545             GetColor(brchild_pos) == BLACK) {
00546             if (brother_pos != NPOS) SetColor(brother_pos, RED);
00547             EraseFixup(GetParentPos(parent_pos), parent_pos);
00548             return;
00549         }
00550 
00551         // [3] if parent is red, but brother, blchild, brchild are black
00552         //       parent[R]                             parent[B]                |
00553         //       /    \                                 /       \               |
00554         //    pos[B]   brother[B]        ==>       pos[B]   brother[R]          |
00555         //            /        \                             /     \            |
00556         //       blchild[B]   brchild[B]             blchild[B]   blchild[B]    |
00557         if (GetColor(parent_pos) == RED && GetColor(brother_pos) == BLACK && GetColor(blchild_pos) == BLACK &&
00558             GetColor(brchild_pos) == BLACK) {
00559             SetColor(parent_pos, BLACK);
00560             if (brother_pos != NPOS) SetColor(brother_pos, RED);
00561             return;
00562         }
00563 
00564         // [4] if blchild is red, brother and brchild are black,
00565         //       parent[]                         parent[]                  |
00566         //       /    \                             /     \                 |
00567         //    pos[B]   brother[B]        ==>   pos[B]   blchild[B]          |
00568         //            /        \                         /      \           |
00569         //       blchild[R]   brchild[B]                [B]    brother[R]   |
00570         //          /                                              \        |
00571         //        [B]                                           brchild[B]  |
00572         if (GetLChildPos(parent_pos) == pos && GetColor(blchild_pos) == RED && GetColor(brchild_pos) == BLACK) {
00573             SetColor(brother_pos, RED);
00574             SetColor(blchild_pos, BLACK);
00575             RotateRight(brother_pos);
00576             // re-calc brother pos
00577             brother_pos = GetBrotherPos(parent_pos, pos);
00578             blchild_pos = GetLChildPos(brother_pos);
00579             brchild_pos = GetRChildPos(brother_pos);
00580         }
00581 
00582         if (GetRChildPos(parent_pos) == pos && GetColor(blchild_pos) == BLACK && GetColor(brchild_pos) == RED) {
00583             SetColor(brother_pos, RED);
00584             SetColor(brchild_pos, BLACK);
00585             RotateLeft(brother_pos);
00586             // re-calc brother pos
00587             brother_pos = GetBrotherPos(parent_pos, pos);
00588             blchild_pos = GetLChildPos(brother_pos);
00589             brchild_pos = GetRChildPos(brother_pos);
00590         }
00591 
00592         // [5] if brchild is red, brother is black
00593         //       parent[]                              brother[]                |
00594         //       /    \                                 /     \                 |
00595         //    pos[B]   brother[B]        ==>      parent[B]   brchild[B]        |
00596         //            /        \                  /      \                      |
00597         //       blchild[]   brchild[R]      pos[B]   blchild[]                 |
00598         if (GetLChildPos(parent_pos) == pos && GetColor(brchild_pos) == RED) {
00599             SetColor(brother_pos, GetColor(parent_pos));
00600             SetColor(parent_pos, BLACK);
00601             SetColor(brchild_pos, BLACK);
00602             RotateLeft(parent_pos);
00603         }
00604 
00605         //         parent[]                brother[]            |
00606         //          /    \                  /      \            |
00607         //    brother[B] pos[B]  ==>  blchild[B]   parent[B]    |
00608         //     /       \                           /     \      |
00609         // blchild[R] brchild[]             brchild[]  pos[B]   |
00610         if (GetRChildPos(parent_pos) == pos && GetColor(blchild_pos) == RED) {
00611             SetColor(brother_pos, GetColor(parent_pos));
00612             SetColor(parent_pos, BLACK);
00613             SetColor(blchild_pos, BLACK);
00614             RotateRight(parent_pos);
00615         }
00616     }
00617 
00619     // other funcs
00621     // get one node from the empty list, return the pos
00622     size_type GetNodeFromEmptyList() {
00623         size_type pos = _empty_head_pos;
00624         if (GetRChildPos(_empty_head_pos) == _empty_head_pos) {  // single node loop
00625             _empty_head_pos = NPOS;
00626         } else {
00627             SetLChildPos(GetRChildPos(_empty_head_pos), GetLChildPos(_empty_head_pos));
00628             SetRChildPos(GetLChildPos(_empty_head_pos), GetRChildPos(_empty_head_pos));
00629             _empty_head_pos = GetRChildPos(_empty_head_pos);
00630         }
00631         return pos;
00632     }
00633 
00634     // insert pos before the empty_head_pos
00635     void InsertNodeToEmptyList(size_type pos) {
00636         if (_empty_head_pos == NPOS) {  // none node, so form a sinlge loop node
00637             SetRChildPos(pos, pos);
00638             SetLChildPos(pos, pos);
00639         } else {
00640             SetRChildPos(pos, _empty_head_pos);
00641             SetLChildPos(pos, GetLChildPos(_empty_head_pos));
00642             SetLChildPos(GetRChildPos(pos), pos);
00643             SetRChildPos(GetLChildPos(pos), pos);
00644         }
00645         SetParentPos(pos, NPOS);
00646         SetColor(pos, EMPTY);
00647         _empty_head_pos = pos;
00648     }
00649 
00651     // accessor funcs
00653     bool full() const { return _size == _max_size - 1; }
00654     bool empty() const { return _size == 0; }
00655 
00656     size_type size() const { return _size; }
00657     size_type max_size() const { return _max_size - 1; }
00658     size_t ElemByteSize() const { return _elem_byte_size; }
00659 
00660     node_type *GetNodePtr(size_type pos) { return (node_type *)(this + 1) + pos; }
00661     value_type *GetDataPtr(size_type pos) { return &GetNodePtr(pos)->data; }
00662 
00663     node_type const *GetNodePtr(size_type pos) const { return (node_type *)(this + 1) + pos; }
00664     value_type const *GetDataPtr(size_type pos) const { return &GetNodePtr(pos)->data; }
00665 
00666     size_type GetRootPos() const { return _root_pos; }
00667     size_type GetLChildPos(size_type pos) const {
00668         if (pos == NPOS) return NPOS;
00669         return GetNodePtr(pos)->lchild_pos;
00670     }
00671     size_type GetRChildPos(size_type pos) const {
00672         if (pos == NPOS) return NPOS;
00673         return GetNodePtr(pos)->rchild_pos;
00674     }
00675     size_type GetParentPos(size_type pos) const { return GetNodePtr(pos)->parent_pos; }
00676     uint8_t GetColor(size_type pos) const { return GetNodePtr(pos)->color; }
00677 
00678     void SetLChildPos(size_type pos, size_type lchild_pos) { GetNodePtr(pos)->lchild_pos = lchild_pos; }
00679     void SetRChildPos(size_type pos, size_type rchild_pos) { GetNodePtr(pos)->rchild_pos = rchild_pos; }
00680     void SetParentPos(size_type pos, size_type parent_pos) { GetNodePtr(pos)->parent_pos = parent_pos; }
00681     void SetColor(size_type pos, uint8_t color) { GetNodePtr(pos)->color = color; }
00682 
00683     // this version pos cant be NPOS
00684     size_type GetBrotherPos(size_type pos) const {
00685         if (pos == NPOS) return NPOS;
00686 
00687         size_type parent_pos = GetParentPos(pos);
00688         if (GetLChildPos(parent_pos) == pos)
00689             return GetRChildPos(parent_pos);
00690         else
00691             return GetLChildPos(parent_pos);
00692     }
00693 
00694     size_type GetBrotherPos(size_type parent_pos, size_type pos) const {
00695         if (pos == NPOS) {
00696             if (GetLChildPos(parent_pos) == NPOS)
00697                 return GetRChildPos(parent_pos);
00698             else
00699                 return GetLChildPos(parent_pos);
00700         } else {
00701             return GetBrotherPos(pos);
00702         }
00703     }
00704 
00705     static size_t CalcByteSize(size_type size) { return (size + 1) * sizeof(node_type) + sizeof(this_type); }
00706     static size_t CalcElemByteSize(void const *ptr) { return ((this_type const *)ptr)->ElemByteSize(); }
00707     static size_t CalcElemMaxSize(void const *ptr) { return ((this_type const *)ptr)->max_size(); }
00708 
00709 private:
00710     size_type _size;
00711     size_type _max_size;
00712     size_type _elem_byte_size;
00713     // here we use one NIL Node to mark all nil leaf node
00714     // so must store this nil pos in state
00715     size_type _nil_pos;
00716     size_type _root_pos;
00717     size_type _empty_head_pos;
00718 };
00719 
00721 // RBTreeIterator
00723 template <typename ElemType, typename SizeType>
00724 class RBTreeIterator : public std::iterator<std::bidirectional_iterator_tag, ElemType> {
00725 public:
00726     using base_type = std::iterator<std::bidirectional_iterator_tag, ElemType>;
00727     using value_type = typename base_type::value_type;
00728     using pointer = typename base_type::pointer;
00729     using reference = typename base_type::reference;
00730     using difference_type = typename base_type::difference_type;
00731     using state_type = RBTreeState<ElemType, SizeType>;
00732     using size_type = SizeType;
00733 
00734 public:
00735     // constructor
00736     RBTreeIterator(state_type *ptr_state = nullptr, size_type pos = 0) : _ptr_state(ptr_state), _pos(pos) {}
00737 
00738     // member funcs
00739     RBTreeIterator operator+(difference_type diff) const {
00740         RBTreeIterator tmp = *this;
00741 
00742         if (diff < 0) return tmp - (-diff);
00743         while (diff != 0) {
00744             ++tmp;
00745             --diff;
00746         }
00747         return tmp;
00748     }
00749 
00750     RBTreeIterator operator-(difference_type diff) const {
00751         RBTreeIterator tmp = *this;
00752 
00753         if (diff < 0) return tmp + (-diff);
00754         while (diff != 0) {
00755             --tmp;
00756             --diff;
00757         }
00758         return tmp;
00759     }
00760 
00761     RBTreeIterator &operator++() {
00762         _pos = _ptr_state->FindNextBigPos(_pos);
00763         return *this;
00764     }
00765     RBTreeIterator &operator--() {
00766         _pos = _ptr_state->FindNextSmallPos(_pos);
00767         return *this;
00768     }
00769 
00770     pointer operator->() { return _ptr_state->GetDataPtr(_pos); }
00771     reference operator*() { return *(_ptr_state->GetDataPtr(_pos)); }
00772 
00773     RBTreeIterator operator++(int) {
00774         RBTreeIterator tmp = *this;
00775         ++*this;
00776         return tmp;
00777     }
00778     RBTreeIterator operator--(int) {
00779         RBTreeIterator tmp = *this;
00780         --*this;
00781         return tmp;
00782     }
00783 
00784     bool operator==(RBTreeIterator const& rhs) const { return _ptr_state == rhs._ptr_state && _pos == rhs._pos; }
00785     bool operator!=(RBTreeIterator const& rhs) const { return !(_ptr_state == rhs._ptr_state && _pos == rhs._pos); }
00786 
00787     size_type GetPos() const { return _pos; }
00788 
00789 private:
00790     state_type *_ptr_state;
00791     size_type _pos;
00792 };
00793 
00794 }  // end of namespace detail
00795 }  // end of namespace container
00796 }  // end of namespace lsf
